front.div:
We're a leading supplier of milk proteins for use in food and beverage applications. Our milk protein
ingredients offer excellent nutritional value while providing value-adding functional properties like
improved flavor, solubility and heat stability.
Whatever your application need, we have the processing expertise and advanced dairy resources to help
you achieve your project goals.
Click to CloseSolmiko Milk Protein Isolate & Milk Protein Concentrate
Solmiko milk protein concentrate (MPC) and milk protein isolate (MPI) are excellent sources of native
casein and whey proteins that offer excellent flavor, solubility and heat stability. Solmiko milk proteins are
ideally suited for applications where low micro counts, functionality and flavor are critical, including
ready-to-drink and instant protein beverages, sports nutrition bars and beverages, and fresh dairy products.
Applications Benefits
Beverages Foods
Supplements
Age-Related Muscle Maintenance
Food & Beverage Fortification
Sports Performance
Request Product Details >
Solmiko MPC 80 is a spray-dried milk protein concentrate powder with 85% protein, manufactured from
fresh, ultrafiltered skim milk. Solmiko MPC 80 is a good source of native micellar casein and whey
proteins in the same ratio as found naturally in milk. The product is characterized by low bacterial counts.
It has excellent flavor, solubility and heat stability, and is suitable for use in a range of applications, both
functional and nutritional.
Solmiko MPI is a spray-dried milk protein isolate powder with 90% protein, manufactured from fresh,
ultrafiltered skim milk. Solmiko MPI is a good source of native micellar casein and whey proteins in the
same ratio as found naturally in milk. The product is characterized by low bacterial counts, high protein
and low lactose. It has excellent flavor, solubility and heat stability, and is suitable for use in a range of
applications, both functional and nutritional.
